description:
Using python 2.5.8 with nova 1277.

python-novaclient currently sends UUID's for most of its commands as such isn't working with nova trunk for many commands like: password resets, rebuilds, etc.

We should update the compute API so that it handles UUID's for a variety of methods including:

-updates
-rebuilds
-resizes

.etc.
title: update compute API to handle UUID's for rebuild, reboot, passwords...

comments.content:
Using python 2.5.8 with nova 1277.

python-novaclient currently sends UUID's for most of its commands as such isn't working with nova trunk for many commands like: password resets, rebuilds, etc.

We should update the compute API so that it handles UUID's for a variety of methods including:

-updates
-rebuilds
-resizes

.etc.
comments.author: https://api.launchpad.net/1.0/~dan-prince
